shnitsel.rd
===========

.. py:module:: shnitsel.rd

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This module contains functions that accept an RDKit.Chem.Mol object;
   but *not* necessarily functions that *return* a Mol object.

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: set_atom_props(mol, inplace = False, **kws)

   Set properties on atoms of an ``rdkit.Chem.Mol`` object

   :param mol: The ``Mol`` object
   :type mol: rdkit.Chem.mol
   :param inplace: Whether to alter ``mol``; , by default False (returns a copy)
   :type inplace: bool, optional
   :param \*\*kws: A mapping where parameter names represent the name of a property
                   and the arguments are either
                       - a dict mapping the atom indices to values that should be assigned. Missing atom indices are ignored
                       - a sequence of str or int values the atoms should be set to;
                       - ``True``, in which case the atom indices as
                         assigned by RDKit will be used as values;
                       - ``False``, in which the property will be cleared on every atom.
                       - ``None`` values, which are simply ignored
   :type \*\*kws: Sequence[str | int] | Literal[True] | Mapping[int, int | str] | None

   :rtype: A copy of the ``Mol`` object, if ``inplace=False``, otherwise the provided mol

   :raises ValueError: If the amount of values passed to the properties kwargs did not match the amount of
       atoms in the mol.


.. py:function:: mol_to_numbered_smiles(mol)

   Generate a SMILES string containing mapping numbers
   corresponding to the atom indices in the mol object

   :param mol: An ``rdkit.Chem.Mol`` object

   :rtype: A SMILES string

   .. rubric:: Notes

   This is intended as a way to store the connectivity
   and order of a matrix of coordinates


.. py:function:: highlight_pairs(mol, feature_indices)

   Highlight specified pairs of atoms in an image of an ``rdkit.Chem.Mol`` object

   :param mol: The ``Mol`` object
   :type mol: rc.Mol
   :param feature_indices: A list of tuples of indices for various features.
   :type feature_indices: Sequence[FeatureDescriptor]

   :rtype: Raw PNG data
